api_list.name: get_qoutes _by_page
api_list.description: return quotes for the page no
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://quotsy.p.rapidapi.com/quotes/page/2"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "quotsy.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://quotsy.p.rapidapi.com/quotes/page/{page_no}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "quotsy.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
